ovdesc.p: This system updated table stores the IDs of Statement Entries (STMT.ENTRY records) to be reported in the next Cycle 1 Account Statement.

desc.p: Help Text for this field is unavailable. Please refer to the T24 User Guides for further information.
This system updated table stores the IDs of Statement Entries (STMT.ENTRY records) to be reported in the next Cycle 1 Account Statement.
Key of this table would be a valid Account record key.
ID of the STMT.ENTRY record to be reported in the next Cycle 1 Account Statement.
